install.name: paradigm_shift
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description:
Shape 5 - Paradigm Shift


This template is for members of the Shape 5 Joomla Template Club only, it is not free or open to the public domain.

For tutorials pertaining to this template and additional information check out:
Paradigm Shift Demo.

Click here to visit Shape5.com

param.name: directions
param.default: Make sure to hover your mouse over each title in this column for a full description of what each field does.

param.name: xml_s5_highlight
param.label: Highlight Color
param.description: This color controls most hyperlinks, main menu, borders, and titles displayed on the template.

param.name: xml_s5_facebook
param.label: Facebook URL
param.description: Enter the text you desire for the Register button.

param.name: xml_s5_twitter
param.label: Twitter URL
param.description: Enter the url you desire for the twitter button.

param.name: xml_s5_rss
param.label: RSS URL
param.description: Enter the url you desire for the rss button.

param.name: xml_s5_font_resizer
param.label: Enable Font Resizer?
param.description: Choose whether or not to show the font resizer.

param.name: xml_s5_fonts
param.label: Site Font
param.description: Choose the font you desire for your site. View previews here: http://code.google.com/webfonts

param.name: xml_s5_fixed_fluid
param.label: Fixed or Fluid Layout?
param.description: Choose fixed or fluid layout. If choosing fixed you can set your body width below.

param.name: xml_s5_body_width
param.label: Body Width
param.description: Enter the width of the body.

param.name: xml_s5_left_width
param.label: Left Width
param.description: Enter the width of the left column in pixels.

param.name: xml_s5_left_inset_width
param.label: Left Inset Width
param.description: Enter the width of the left inset column in pixels.

param.name: xml_s5_right_width
param.label: Right Width
param.description: Enter the width of the right column in pixels.

param.name: xml_s5_right_inset_width
param.label: Right Inset Width
param.description: Enter the width of the right inset column in pixels.

param.name: menu_instructions
param.default: NOTE - If you have installed this template manually without a site shaper you must also install the S5 Flex Menu plugin from our Club Extensions download area in order to use the main menu system.

param.name: s5_menu_type
param.label: Menu Name
param.description: What menu would you like to use for the default default menu?

param.name: row_instructions
param.default:
Below you can adjust the width of the modules contained in any row of modules or set it to automatic. For example top_row1 contains 6 module positions, if you publish modules to only top_row1_1 and top_row1_2 the modules will each be set to 50% of the available space or you can choose to set them percentages manually. If you choose manual be sure to separate the widths by commas with no spaces.

Note - Even if you are not using all the positions in a row your numbers must still total to 100%. For example if I use top_row2_2 and top_row2_4 and not the others in the row my calculations would like something like 0,30,0,70,0,0 be sure to enter 0 for positions you are not using.

param.name: xml_s5_top_row1_calculation
param.label: top_row1 Modules
param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.name: xml_s5_top_row1_manual_widths
param.label: top_row1 Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.name: xml_s5_top_row2_calculation
param.label: top_row2 Modules
param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.name: xml_s5_top_row2_manual_widths
param.label: top_row2 Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.name: xml_s5_top_row3_calculation
param.label: top_row3 Modules
param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.name: xml_s5_top_row3_manual_widths
param.label: top_row3 Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.name: xml_s5_above_columns_calculation
param.label: above_columns Modules
param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.name: xml_s5_above_columns_manual_widths
param.label: above_columns Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.name: xml_s5_middle_top_calculation
param.label: middle_top Modules
param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.name: xml_s5_middle_top_manual_widths
param.label: middle_top Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.name: xml_s5_above_body_manual_widths
param.label: above_body Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.label: middle_bottom Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.name: xml_s5_below_body_manual_widths
param.label: below_body Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.label: below_columns Manual Widths
param.description: Enter the widths of each module in this row.

param.description: Choose whether to have these module widths automatically calculated or manually set them. If you choose manual your totals must equal to 100% or an error message will appear on the frontend of your site.

param.name: mobile_instructions
param.default: Below you may setup mobile device support for your website. Your menu will be pulled from the same menu set in the Menu Options area. The mobile version contains the unique module positions mobile_top_1, mobile_top_2, mobile_bottom_1, and mobile_bottom_2, you may publish any module to these positions and they will only show on the mobile version. Module positions logo, search and breadcrumb are also present but are shared with the main PC version. Disabling the show frontpage article/component area in General Options will also disable the mobile version's frontpage area.

param.name: xml_s5_mobile_device_enable_disable
param.label: Enable or Disable Mobile Device Layout?
param.description: Choose whether or not to display a smaller version of your site for mobile devices.

param.name: xml_s5_mobile_device_menu_subs
param.label: Show first level menu links only or all links?
param.description: Choose whether or not to display all menu links or just the first level links. Sub menu items will not appear as subs within the drop down, they will all appear in collective list. All links will be listed alphabetically.

param.name: xml_s5_mobile_device_menu_title
param.label: Text for default drop down menu item
param.description: This text will show as the first item in the mobile device drop down menu.

param.name: xml_s5_mobile_device_login
param.label: Show the login button?
param.description: Choose whether or not to display the login button.

param.name: xml_s5_mobile_device_register
param.label: Show the register button?
param.description: Choose whether or not to display the register button.

param.name: xml_s5_mobile_device_pc_text
param.label: PC Version Link text
param.description: Enter the text that will be used for the PC version link found in the footer.

param.name: xml_s5_multibox
param.label: Enable Multibox?
param.description: Enable the multibox feature for your images NOTE: it is highly recommened to disable if you are not planning to use

param.name: xml_s5_multioverlay
param.label: Enable Multibox Overlay?
param.description: Enable the multibox overlay feature.

param.name: xml_s5_multicontrols
param.label: Enable Multibox Controls?
param.description: Enable the multibox controls.

param.name: xml_s5_tooltips
param.label: Enable Tooltips?
param.description: Would you like to enable tooltips? NOTE: It is highly recommened to disable this script if you are not planning to use it.

param.name: xml_s5_moover
param.label: Template Mootools Version - Choose 1.2.4 only if you have enabled the System Mootools Upgrade Plugin
param.description: Choose your mootools library version

param.name: xml_s5_thirdparty
param.label: Third Party Styles
param.description: Choose to enable or disable the third party stylings

param.name: xml_s5_seourl
param.label: Your Site URL if SEO enabled - Example: http://www.mysite.com
param.description: If you turn on SEO URLs and your site loses its CSS formatting and flat out doesn't work enter your full site url here. Example: http://www.mysite.com

param.name: frontpage_instructions
param.default: Below you can choose whether or not show the content/component area on the frontpage. If you choose no you must have a module published in one of the following rows: middle_top, above_body, below_body, or middle_bottom, or the layout will not show correctly because no middle column will be present. If you choose no and disable all modules published to the main, middle area of the site, ie: left, right, left_inset, above_body, etc. then entire middle section will collapse.

param.name: xml_s5_frontpage
param.label: Would You Like The Component and Article Area Shown On The Frontpage?
param.description: Choose whether or not to show the component and article section on the frontpage of the site.

param.name: xml_s5_ie6plugin
param.label: Choose to enable IE6 upgrade warning.
param.description: Choose whether or not to enable IE6 upgrade warning.

param.name: xml_s5_scrolltotop
param.label: Choose to enable scroll to top arrow.
param.description: Choose whether or not to enable the scroll to top arrow. When clicked the screen will scroll to the top of the page

param.name: login_logout_sub1
param.default: Note - In order for the login and register boxes to work you must have the S5 Box module published to all pages on your site. Publish it to a position towards the bottom of the page, it will not be visible on the page. This module can be downloaded the Club Extensions area.

param.name: xml_s5_login
param.label: Login Text
param.description: Enter the text you desire for the login button

param.name: xml_s5_loginout
param.label: Logout Text
param.description: Enter the text you desire for the logout button once users are logged in.

param.name: xml_s5_register
param.label: Register Text
param.description: Enter the text you desire for the register button

param.name: tabs_sub1
param.default: Note - To disable a fixed tab simply leave the text area blank.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab_border
param.label: Fixed Tab Border Color
param.description: Enter in Hex the color for the fixed tab borders.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab_color
param.label: Fixed Tab Background Color
param.description: Enter in Hex the color for the fixed tab backgrounds.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab_font
param.label: Fixed Tab Font Color
param.description: Enter in Hex the color for the fixed tab font color.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab1_text
param.label: Fixed Tab 1 Text
param.description: Enter the text you desire for the first fixed tab button. If no text is added it will auto disable.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab1_vp
param.label: Fixed Tab 1 Vertical Position
param.description: Enter in a percentage example 40%, the vertical position on screen you desire for the first fixed tab.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab1_height
param.label: Fixed Tab 1 Height
param.description: Enter the height of the first fixed tab button in px.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab1_class
param.label: Fixed Tab 1 Class
param.description: You can add a class name to the first fixed tab to enable a lightbox plugin, or perhaps the s5 box.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab1_click
param.label: Fixed Tab 1 On Click URL
param.description: Enter a URL if you want the first tab to go to a location on click

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab1_left_right
param.label: Left or Right of Screen
param.description: Choose to display the first fixed tab on the left or right side of your screen

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab2_text
param.label: Fixed Tab 2 Text
param.description: Enter the text you desire for the second fixed tab button. If no text is added it will auto disable.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab2_vp
param.label: Fixed Tab 2 Vertical Position
param.description: Enter in a percentage example 40%, the vertical position on screen you desire for the second fixed tab.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab2_height
param.label: Fixed Tab 2 Height
param.description: Enter the height of the first second tab button in px.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab2_class
param.label: Fixed Tab 2 Class
param.description: You can add a class name to the second fixed tab to enable a lightbox plugin, or perhaps the s5 box.

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab2_click
param.label: Fixed Tab 2 On Click
param.description: Enter a URL if you want the second tab to go to a location on click

param.name: xml_s5_lr_tab2_left_right
param.label: Left or Right of Screen
param.description: Choose to display the second fixed tab on the left or right side of your screen
